name: OpenAssistant/oasst1
description: OpenAssistant Conversations Dataset (OASST1) is a comprehensive, human-generated and human-annotated collection of assistant-style conversations, totaling 161,443 messages across 35 languages. This dataset, a result of a global crowd-sourcing initiative with over 13,500 volunteers, includes 461,292 quality ratings and over 10,000 fully annotated conversation trees. It aims to facilitate research on large-scale alignment and foster innovation in the field.
citeAs: @article{OpenAssistant_OASST1,   title={OpenAssistant Conversations Dataset (OASST1)},   author={OpenAssistant},   year={2023},   url={https://huggingface.co/datasets/OpenAssistant/oasst1},   license={Apache-2.0},   note={A comprehensive, human-generated and human-annotated collection of assistant-style conversations, totaling 161,443 messages across 35 languages. This dataset, a result of a global crowd-sourcing initiative with over 13,500 volunteers, includes 461,292 quality ratings and over 10,000 fully annotated conversation trees. It aims to facilitate research on large-scale alignment and foster innovation in the field.}, }
creator: OpenAssistant
inLanguage: en, es, ru, de, pl, th, vi, sv, bn, da, he, it, fa, sk, id, nb, el, nl, hu, eu, zh, eo, ja, ca, cs, bg, fi, pt, tr, ro, ar, uk, gl, fr, ko
